title: Prepare a Lease Abstract
description: An investor who is buying a tenanted commercial building needs a summary of a key tenant's lease.

tasks.description: Obtain the full commercial lease document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the complete lease PDF.

tasks.description: Extract key data points from the lease, including: tenant name, premises, term, rent schedule, renewal options, and use clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately extracts all specified information from the lengthy legal document.

tasks.description: Generate a concise lease abstract report summarizing the key data points.
tasks.expected_outcome: A one-page summary document is created and provided to the investor client.
